markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Janni Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=2586) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Suli" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=310" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 111 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

The magic of [jann](/Monsters.aspx?ID=211) runs through your blood. You can cast [_enlarge_](/Spells.aspx?ID=102) and [_speak with animals_](/Spells.aspx?ID=293) once per day each as 2nd-level arcane innate spells.
name: Janni Magic
